pages.text:
About us
West End
Welcome to The Shack, the ultimate dive bar experience in town. We are at the first exit on I-10 in Florida (
Exit 5
).  This exit is located just after you cross the state line from Alabama into Florida.  We’re not just a watering hole – we’re a community gathering place where everyone feels at home. Whether you’re a local looking to unwind or a visitor eager to soak up the authentic vibe, The Shack is the perfect spot to let loose and enjoy great company. We have been a dive bar staple in this town for years. We might not be fancy, but we’ve got the kind of character and charm that keeps folks coming back. Whether you’re looking for a cold one after work or a rowdy night out with friends, you’ll feel right at home at The Shack.  Come on by and see why we’re the go-to spot for locals and visitors alike.
Our Vibe
Sure, we may not be the fanciest joint in town, but that’s part of the appeal. At The Shack, you’ll find a laid-back, no-frills atmosphere where you can kick back, order a cold one, and let your worries melt away. With classic rock on the jukebox and pool tables, it’s the perfect spot to unwind and enjoy the simple pleasures in life.
Our History
The Shack started out as a humble watering hole back in the 70s. Over the years, we’ve earned a reputation as the go-to spot for good times and good company. From the bartenders who’ve been slinging drinks for decades to the regulars who feel like family, there’s a sense of community that you just can’t find anywhere else.
Upcoming Events
Join us at The Shack for a variety of exciting events throughout the year. From live music and pool tournaments to karaoke and themed parties, there’s always something happening at The Shack. Check our events calendar to see what’s on tap for the week.  Follow us on social media to stay up-to-date on the latest happenings.
Our Location
You can find us at 2800 W 9 Mile Road, Pensacola, FL 32534, where we’ve been serving up cold drinks and good times for years. Whether you’re looking to chilled out, or enjoy a night out with friends, The Shack is the place to be. Stop by and see us anytime – we’re open 7 days a week, (850)912-8084.

Contact Us
At The Shack, we’re always happy to chat. Whether you’ve got a question, a comment our friendly team is here to assist.
Swing by our cozy dive bar at 2800 W Nine Mile Rd, Pensacola, FL 32534 or give us a call at (850)912-8084. We’ll be glad to discuss how we can best meet your needs.
We pride ourselves on providing a welcoming atmosphere and top-notch service. So don’t hesitate to reach out – we’re here to make your experience at The Shack a memorable one.
